tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    total_purchases DECIMAL,
    last_purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
	customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name VARCHAR(255),
	email VARCHAR(255),
	total_spent DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE promotions (
	promotion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	promotion_name VARCHAR(255),
	promotion_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE high_value_customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    total_purchase_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    last_purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE promotions (
    promo_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    promo_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    discount DECIMAL(5,2),
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_promotions (
    customer_id INT,
    promo_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (customer_id, promo_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES high_value_customers(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (promo_id) REFERENCES promotions(promo_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email_address VARCHAR(100),
    total_spent DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    order_date DATE,
    order_total DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE promotions (
    promotion_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    promotion_name VARCHAR(50),
    promotion_description TEXT,
    promotion_start_date DATE,
    promotion_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE emails (
    email_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    email_subject VARCHAR(100),
    email_content TEXT,
    email_sent_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE high_value_customers (
    customer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    total_orders INT,
    total_spent DECIMAL
)
